column4: hey guys kinda buggered up my fstab is there a way i can go back to the back up file and restore it?
mount the partition manually with a mount command, replace /etc/fstab with the backup and reboot
sudo fdisk -l to find out what partition you need to mount
did it mount read-only or do you need to be root?
you're probably just in the directory. type "cd" first
but the remount should work even if it's being used
